mathematica: nmax = 100; A227291 = Abs[Table[DivisorSum[n, Abs[MoebiusMu[#]]*MoebiusMu[n/#] &], {n, 1, nmax}]]; Table[DivisorSum[n, Abs[MoebiusMu[n/#]] * A227291[[#]] &], {n, 1, nmax}]
